top_categories.workout_context: Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder. Make this intensity feel like home.
Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder’s pennsylvania rolling, local event demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
The varied gradients at Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Racing Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder’s pennsylvania rolling gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder’s pennsylvania rolling gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Low-cadence force work builds the muscular strength for Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder’s 4,000ft of climbing — especially the grinding, low-speed ascents.
Every session at Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder’s 50 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Camp Michaux Gravel Grinder requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on pennsylvania rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: pennsylvania rolling, local event, northeast gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Over Under, and G Spot to prepare you for 50 miles of pennsylvania rolling gravel in Gardners, Pennsylvania.
